resources.string: Authentication failed! Please enter valid password/code
Access to data failed! You may not have sufficient rights
Could not connect to Data source! Please check your connection settings
Data or value(s) did not match!
Concept not found in local database. Make sure your metadata is up-to-date
Error in deleting data. Some other data may be dependent on the item you want to delete
Duplication error! Another copy of the same data or ID already exists
Empty data! Please fill in the required field(s)
Error in inserting data. Please make sure you are not violating validation rules
No data was found matching the criteria
Invalid value! Please make sure your input is in correct format
Date or Time is invalid. Make sure you have entered appropriate date/time
This person was not marked as a Suspect. In order to save this form, you must mark the person as a suspect and assign a valid Patient ID
Operation cancelled
Value out of range!
One or more Parameters are invalid or missing. Please make sure you have defined valid parameters
Data cannot be parsed. Please make sure data is in valid format
Patient ID does not exist. Please make sure you have entered correct Patient ID
Session expired! Please re-login to continue operation
Unknown error encountered! Please check error log for details
Error in updating data. Please make sure you are not violating validation rules
User not found! Please enter correct user name
User role not found or undefined! Please contact Administrator or select a different Role
